citeinfo.origin: Natural Lands Trust with input data from PA DEP.
citeinfo.title: Important Bird Areas for Pennsylvania

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows 2000 Version 5.0 (Build 2195) Service Pack 4; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.1.0.722

procstep.procdesc:
Process: Convert features to Raster Set options: Extent: Same as "DEM_SEPA snap extent: Dem.Sepa cell size: 30
Input "Important_Bird_Areas_CoreArea" (in SDE) Save as: "IBA_Core_PA" in: individual_grid\IBA_CoreArea_PA\
Input: "Important_Bird_Areas_BufferArea" (in SDE) Save as "IBA_Buff_PA" in: individual_grid\IBA_BufferArea_Pa\
Clip to Study Area Options: mask: 'Study Area' Extent: same as "DEM_SEPA" snap extent: "DEM_SEPA" cell size same as "DEM_SEPA"
Raster Calc: [IBA_Core_PA] Save as: "._IBA_Core" in: \'study area'\individual_grid\IBA_Core\ use: 'Study Area' as mask
Raster Calc: [IBA_Buff_PA] Save as: "._IBA_Buff" in: \'study area'\individual_grid\IBA_Buff\ use: 'Study Area' as mask
Reclassify to assign Conservation Value Relcassify so that "._IBACore" Value=3 No Data=0 Saved as: "._IBACore_Ra" in: \'study area'\ranked_grids_Interim\IBA_Core\
Relcassify so that "._IBABuff" Value=1 No Data=0 Saved as: "._IBABuff_Ra" in: \'study area'\ranked_grids_Interim\IBA_Buff\
Merge the Core areas and Buffer areas together to combine them into one raster: (The Core Areas will be first in the calculation so that if there is any overlap between the cells the greater value will override.) Raster Calculator: Merge([.IBA_Core], [.IBA_Buff])

procstep.srcused: Y:\ArcGIS_Projects\Smart Conservation Documentation\Metadata\Aquatic\riparian buffer quality expanded piedmont.xml
Y:\ArcGIS_Projects\Smart Conservation Documentation\Metadata\Expanded Piedmont Ecoregion\Aquatic\water quality 303d 305b.xml
Y:\ArcGIS_Projects\Smart Conservation Documentation\Metadata\Expanded Piedmont Ecoregion\Aquatic\Forested Water Quality.xml
Y:\ArcGIS_Projects\Smart Conservation Documentation\Metadata\Expanded Piedmont Ecoregion\Aquatic\Fish Habitat.xml
Y:\ArcGIS_Projects\Smart Conservation Documentation\Metadata\Expanded Piedmont Ecoregion\Aquatic\Herp Aquatic Habitat.xml
Y:\ArcGIS_Projects\Smart Conservation Documentation\Metadata\Expanded Piedmont Ecoregion\Terrestrial\Herps Terrestrial Habitat.xml
Y:\ArcGIS_Projects\Smart Conservation Documentation\Metadata\Expanded Piedmont Ecoregion\Terrestrial\Mammals Habitat.xml

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.
